pressing.translation[0].definitions[0].d: needing to be discussed or dealt with very soon
pressing.translation[0].definitions[0].e: Poverty is a more pressing problem than pollution.
pressing.translation[1].definitions[0].d: a thing or group of things, especially records or CDs, that have been made by pressing plastic or metal into shape
pressing.translation[1].definitions[0].e: The CD, released in October, sold out a first pressing of 1,500 in just four months.
pressing.translation[1].definitions[1].e: The olives are heat treated during the second pressing.
